method.name: GetName
method.description: returns the name identifier of the driver

method.name: GetType
method.description: returns the type identifier of the driver

method.name: GetVersion
method.description: returns the version identifiers of the driver

method.name: GetHeaderInformation
method.description: returns the header information

method.name: QueryParameters
method.description: Stores the driver parameters in the driver environment.

class.name: Driver_Marlin
class.description: A Driver for a Marlin Reprap controller board.

method.name: Connect
method.description: Creates and initializes a new Marlin Connector.

method.name: Disconnect
method.description: Disconnects from the Marlin board.

method.name: SetAbsolutePositioning
method.description: Sets the positioning to absolute values (default true).

param.name: Absolute
param.description: If true, sets positioning to absolute, if false to relative

method.name: SetHeatedBedTargetTemperature
method.description: Sets heated bed target temperature.

param.name: WaitForTemp
param.description: If true, waits for the target bed temperature to be reached before proceeding

method.name: SetExtruderTargetTemperature
method.description: Sets target temperature of the given extruder.

param.name: WaitForTemp
param.description: If true, waits for the target extruder temperature to be reached before proceeding

method.name: SetFanSpeed
method.description: Turns on one of the fans and set its speed.

method.name: SetPidParameters
method.description: Sets PID parameters.

method.name: UpdatePositionState
method.description: Polls a new state from the printer.

method.name: UpdateTemperatureState
method.description: Polls a new temperature state from the printer.

method.name: GetCurrentPosition
method.description: Returns the current axis position.

method.name: GetTargetPosition
method.description: Returns the current target position.

method.name: GetExtruderTargetPosition
method.description: Returns the target extruder position.

method.name: GetHeatedBedTargetTemperature
method.description: Returns the the target bed temperature.

method.name: GetHeatedBedCurrentTemperature
method.description: Returns the current bed temperature.

method.name: GetExtruderCurrentTemperature
method.description: Returns the current temperature of an extruder.

method.name: GetExtruderTargetTemperature
method.description: Returns the target temperature of an extruder.

method.name: GetPidParameters
method.description: Returns the current PID values.

method.name: CanExecuteMovement
method.description: Returns if the movement buffer can receive another movement command..

param.name: Value
param.description: True if a MoveTo or MoveFastTo command can be triggered.

method.name: IsMoving
method.description: Returns if the extruder is moving..

method.name: IsHomed
method.description: Returns if the printer is homed

method.name: IsConnected
method.description: Returns if the printer is coneccted

method.name: MoveToXY
method.description: Moves to/by a certain position by a linear move. Takes the relative/absolute mode into account. Fails if it cannot execute a movement.

method.name: MoveFastToXY
method.description: Moves to/by a certain position by a fast move. Takes the relative/absolute mode into account. Fails if it cannot execute a movement.

method.name: MoveToZ
method.description: Moves to/by a certain position by a linear move. Takes the relative/absolute mode into account. Fails if it cannot execute a movement.

method.name: MoveFastToZ
method.description: Moves to/by a certain position by a fast move. Takes the relative/absolute mode into account. Fails if it cannot execute a movement.

method.name: StartHoming
method.description: Start Homing of printer.

method.name: EmergencyStop
method.description: Used for emergency stopping. Shuts down the machine, turns off all the steppers and heaters, and if possible, turns off the power supply.

method.name: SetAxisPosition
method.description: Set the current position of given axis to the specified value.

param.name: Axis
param.description: Axis whose value is to be set.

method.name: ExtruderDoExtrude
method.description: Extrudes the specified value with given Feedrate.

method.name: SetAbsoluteExtrusion
method.description: Sets the extrusion (E axis) to absolute mode.

param.name: Absolute
param.description: If true, sets mode to absolute, if false to relative

method.name: StopIdleHold
method.description: Stop the idle hold on all axis and extruder.

method.name: PowerOff
method.description: Turn off the high-voltage power supply.

method.name: GetVersion
method.description: retrieves the binary version of this library.

param.name: Major
param.description: returns the major version of this library

param.name: Minor
param.description: returns the minor version of this library

param.name: Micro
param.description: returns the micro version of this library

method.name: GetLastError
method.description: Returns the last error recorded on this object

param.name: HasError
param.description: Is there a last error to query

method.name: ReleaseInstance
method.description: Releases shared ownership of an Instance

method.name: AcquireInstance
method.description: Acquires shared ownership of an Instance

method.name: InjectComponent
method.description: Injects an imported component for usage within this component

param.name: SymbolAddressMethod
param.description: Address of the SymbolAddressMethod of the injected component

method.name: GetSymbolLookupMethod
method.description: Returns the address of the SymbolLookupMethod

method.name: CreateDriver
method.description: Creates a driver instance with a specific name.

param.name: Name
param.description: Name of driver to be created.

param.name: Type
param.description: Type of driver to be created.
